author: Special Correspondent
text:
Over 580 cattle were treated for various ailments at a free veterinary camp organised under the Puduvaazhvu Thittam at Sankarapandiapuram on Tuesday. Puduvaazhvu Thittam is implemented in Sattur, Vembakottai, Watrap and Narikudi blocks of Virudhunagar district.

Cattle from Sankarapandiapuram, Jagaveeranpatti and Servaikkaranpatti were screened at the camp.
title: Free veterinary camp organised
